content: learn and improve this free pattern for others also post your project on ravelry so i can gush over your work i would love to see your fo if you feel like sharing ⊹ ۪ ˑ ִ ֗ ִ ۫ ˑ⋅˚₊‧ ୨୧ ‧₊˚ ⋅⊹ ۪ ˑ ִ ֗ ִ ۫ ˑ obligatory disclaimer all contents of this pattern are subject to copyright laws please don t copy redistribute resell or otherwise misuse my pattern i don t mind if you sell your finished item but please credit me as the designer thanks for knitting with me ♥ -meredith aka little quail
